title: MetricsTimeseriesRow
description: Metrics data for a single day.

testPositivity.title: Testpositivity
testPositivity.description: Ratio of people who test positive calculated using a 7-day rolling average.

caseDensity.title: Casedensity
caseDensity.description: The number of cases per 100k population calculated using a 7-day rolling average.

contactTracerCapacity.title: Contacttracercapacity
contactTracerCapacity.description: Ratio of currently hired tracers to estimated tracers needed based on 7-day daily case average.
